name: Disney's Atlantis: The Lost Empire - Trial by Fire
summary: Unlock the secrets and unleash the adventure. Your rite of passage begins with Disney's Atlantis: The Lost Empire, Trial By Fire CD-ROM. You assume the role of Milo in the single-player mode, and, aided by several members of the Atlantis exploration team, undergo intense trials based upon the four elements of ancient Greek philosophy: fire, water, air, and earth. Bravely making your way through mind-bending puzzles, diabolical traps, and the formidable denizens of Atlantis, your ultimate quest in this first-person action adventure is to save the legendary city from certain destruction by a cataclysmic volcanic eruption.
